item.title: Some less-known or underused macOS tools
item.description: Mouting got stuck Time Machine can be configured to store backup data on a remote server, for instance, via SambaFS. Up to macOS 10.13, after selecting the dedicated shared folder, Time Machine works automatically and flawlessly.
